query.name: get_all_assets
query.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT uplink_equipment.*, uplink_equipment_type.name, uplink_location_equipment.location_address_id, (uplink_location_address.name) as location_address_name
FROM uplink_equipment, uplink_equipment_type,uplink_location_equipment, uplink_location_address
WHERE
uplink_equipment.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_equipment.account_id = ? AND uplink_equipment.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id
AND uplink_location_equipment.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_location_equipment.account_id=? AND uplink_location_equipment.equipment_id=uplink_equipment.equipment_id
AND uplink_location_address.location_address_id=uplink_location_equipment.location_address_id AND uplink_location_address.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_location_address.location_address_id=? AND uplink_location_address.account_id=?
AND uplink_equipment_type.account_id=? AND uplink_equipment_type.deletion_datetime > ?
ORDER BY equipment_id
